ingredients.ingredient: 2 Â¼ cups durum wheat semolina flour

cookingTips: Add water gradually as semolina absorbs differently than wheat flour
Knead until smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes
Use cavatelli maker or press dough with fork on ridged surface to create grooves for sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What makes semolina flour different from all-purpose flour? Why are the grooves in cavatelli important?
